plot: Patrick and Basti, two naive small time crooks, have kidnapped the famous billionaire Karl-Heinz Volkner's wife for ransom. When he doesn't show up for the handover, their plan seems to get out of hand.
title: Deadlocked
plot_es: Patrick and Basti, two naive small time crooks, have kidnapped the famous billionaire Karl-Heinz Volkner's wife for ransom. When he doesn't show up for the handover, their plan seems to get out of hand.
plot_en: Patrick and Basti, two naive small time crooks, have kidnapped the famous billionaire Karl-Heinz Volkner's wife for ransom. When he doesn't show up for the handover, their plan seems to get out of hand.
